title: Betting and gaming : United Kingdom HMRC tax receipts 2000 to 2019
yAxis: Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
The highest Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, of value 2.99 was reached at Year 2018/19
The lowest Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, of value 1.29 was reported at Year 2002/03
